content:
Just an advertisement/reminder that there will be two Lean Together talks about CSLib this week:

  • Fabrizio will present CSLib: The Lean Computer Science Library at 2026-01-20T08:00:00-05:00
  • I will present Proof Automation and Metaprogramming in CSLib: Locally Nameless Lambda Calculi at 2026-01-21T15:30:00-05:00

There are also several talks about topics to relevant to CSLib such as the module system and grind that I encourage you to listen to!
Unfortunately, many of the talks are a bit too early in the morning for US west coast (before 6am). I hope the recordings will show up on YouTube soon.
Yes, the times are staggered to accommodate global timezones, but there will be recordings afterwards!
Can we expect news about Boole or about how to contribute algorithms in general?
